name: Central American Resource Center
description: Central American Resource Center (CARECEN) provides a full range of services that promote community empowerment for the Latino and immigrant population of Northern California and immigration legal services, including expert advise and direct services to immigrants with low or no income. For those who recently arrived with your family and need support, CARECEN staff will talk with you and connect you with schools, hospitals and other needs.

address: 3101 Mission Street, Suite 101,  San Francisco, CA, 94110
